## jx controller compliance

Updates a pull request with compliance status

### Synopsis

Updates a pull request with compliance status

```
jx controller compliance [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for compliance
      --pre    Run the pre-submit phase which creates a pending status
```
